sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- Update Order Modal -->
  <UpdateOrderModal
      :isVisible="isUpdateModalVisible"
      :order="selectedOrder"
      @close="closeUpdateModal"
      @update-order="handleUpdateOrder"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { getOrders, createOrder, deleteOrder, updateOrder } from '@/services/orderService';
import UpdateOrderModal from '@/modals/UpdateOrderModal.vue';

export default {
  components: {
    UpdateOrderModal
  },
  data() {
    return {
      // ...other data
      selectedOrder: null,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openUpdateModal(order) {
      this.selectedOrder = { ...order }; // Ensure a deep copy
      this.isUpdateModalVisible = true;
    },
    async handleUpdateOrder(updatedOrder) {
      try {
        await updateOrder(updatedOrder.orderID, updatedOrder);
        this.fetchOrders();
        this.closeUpdateModal();
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error updating order:', error);
      }
    },
    // Other methods like closeUpdateModal
  }
};
</script>


<style scoped>
.modal {
  display: block;
  position: fixed;
  z-index: 1000;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.modal-content {
  position: relative;
  margin: 10% auto;
  padding: 20px;
  width: 50%;
  background-color: white;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

.close {
  position: absolute;
  right: 10px;
  top: 10px;
  cursor: pointer;
}
</style>
